item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Wednesday, September 4, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Firefox will consider a Rust implementation of JPEG-XL (37 points | 10 comments)

8. In practice, abstractions hide their underlying details (6 points | 5 comments)
9. Greppability is an underrated code metric (45 points | 27 comments)
10. Yubikey is the Digital Seat Belt We Need Today (17 points | 27 comments)
11. Setting up a cache server for apt packages (23 points | 9 comments)
12. A TUI for sniffing network traffic using eBPF on Linux (11 points | 2 comments)
13. Things I Wished More Developers Knew About Databases (2 points | no comments)
14. Is this trait sealed, or not sealed â€” that is the question (10 points | 1 comment)

19. gRPC: 5 Years Later, Is It Still Worth It? (7 points | 11 comments)

21. HardenedBSD August 2024 Status Report (1 points | no comments)
22. Python Programmers' Experience (18 points | 3 comments)

24. Terminfo, at this point in time, is a net-negative on the terminal ecosystem (52 points | 28 comments)
25. Landlock: From a security mechanism idea to a widely available implementation (5 points | 1 comment)
